title: Bewitching Nidalee Legacy Skin Vintage Mark
body:
{{champion:76}} CLIENT
Recently discovered that my Bewitching Nidalee skin is no longer showing the Vintage skin watermark during loading screen. I checked my Lolipoppy Skin and it indeed DOES still have the watermark.

replies.body:
Hi HotDogGoBathroom! 

Funny you should mention this, 'cause I played an ARAM last night and noticed the same thing! It looks like the line that points to the vintage load screen was missing. We've gone ahead and added that line back in. This should be fixed with the next patch. Thanks for the report! <3
